title: 求服务器开服bat
author: 星辰234
txt_content: 求Contigo服务器核心的开服bat呀Java路径：C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_251\bin\java.exe     开服jar文件名:Contigo-1.7.10-1614.UNOFFICIAL-server.jar

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
@echo OFF
:head
 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_251\bin\java.exe" -jar Contigo-1.7.10-1614.UNOFFICIAL-server.jar
goto head

或者要文件？



run.zip
(233 Bytes, 下载次数: 17)



2020-5-31 20:23 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
@echo OFF
:head
set a=-1
:start
set /a a+=1
set b=3
color 3
title Server [已重新启动 %a% 次]
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_251\bin\java.exe" -Xmx4G -Xms4G -jar Contigo-1.7.10-1614.UNOFFICIAL-server.jar
ping -n %b% 127.1>nul
goto start复制代码
